title: イベントアーカイブ-JP
content:
[[include credit:start |mode=no-rate]]
**タイトル:** イベントアーカイブ-JP
**著者:** SCP財団
**作成年:** 2022
[[include credit:end]]


[[=]]
+* [[span style="font-size:120%"]]SCP財団のイベントアーカイブへようこそ[[/span]]

+++* 本ページには過去に開催されたイベントの情報が集約されています。職員は認証済みの身分証を提示し、目的の情報にアクセスしてください。
[[/=]]

・一行目の[[div class="item"]]を、キャンペーンなら[[div class="item campaign"]]に、重賞なら[[div class="item graded"]]にしてください。
・表示が壊れるのでテンプレでは省略しましたが、一行目の前に======がたくさん入ってるやつも他の項目からコピるようにしてください。
・優秀作品の項目には金賞(金トロフィー)相当の作品を掲載してください。
--]

[!-- 以下はCSSです。弄るな！ --]

[[module CSS]]
/* この構文は本家ENの https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/contest-archive を複製・改変して使用されています。Thank you Rounderhouse! 改変してくれたRTa_technologyさんもありがとう！ */

.modal-wrapper {
  list-style: none;
  display: contents;
}
.modal-wrapper>li .foldable-list-container {
  text-align: right;
  font-size: 90%;
}
.modal-wrapper>li.folded .foldable-list-container.chrono {
  display: none;
}
.modal-wrapper>li.unfolded .foldable-list-container.latest {
  display: none;
}
.modal-wrapper>li>.item-list, .modal-wrapper>li #toc-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-flow: column;
}
.modal-wrapper>li.unfolded>.item-list, .modal-wrapper>li.unfolded #toc-list {
  flex-flow: column-reverse;
}
.item-list>div {
  margin: 5px 0;
}
.event-list h1 {
  margin-left: 4.15rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}
.item-list h1 span, .item-title a {
  word-break: initial !important;
}
p[style="text-align: center;"] {
  margin: 0.625em 0;
}
.item {
  background-color: #FFFFFF;
  border: 1px solid #bbb;
  margin: 1.25rem;
  margin-left: 5.15rem;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  position: relative;
}
.item .item-title {
  background-color: #DDFFDD !important;
  position: relative;
  top: -2rem;
  left: -3rem;
  background-color: inherit;
  border: 1px solid #bbb;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  max-width: max-content!important;
  margin-bottom: -3.25rem;
}
.item .item-title p {
  margin: 0.1rem 0.5rem;
}
.item.campaign .item-title {
  background-color: #A9CEEC !important;
}
.item.campaign::before {
  content: "ｷｬﾝﾍﾟｰﾝ";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  display: block;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.45rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.05em;
}
.item.graded .item-title {
  background-color: #FADBDA !important;
}
.item.graded::before {
  content: "重賞";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  display: block;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.45rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 1.05em;
}
.item>hr {
  margin: 0.5rem -2.05rem;
  background-color: transparent;
  height: 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #bbb;
}
.item>table {
  width: 97.5%;
}
.item>table.wiki-content-table tr {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.item>table.wiki-content-table td {
  text-align: center;
  border: none;
  flex-basis: 9rem;
  flex-grow: 1;
}
.item>table.wiki-content-table td::before {
  font-size: 0.95em;
  font-weight: bold;
  display: block;
}
.item>table.wiki-content-table td:first-child::before {
  content: "主催: ";
}
.item>table.wiki-content-table td:last-child::before {
  content: "期間:";
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 660px) {
  .item {
    margin: 1.25rem 0.25rem;
  }
  .item-list h1 {
    width: max-content;
    margin: 0.5rem auto 2rem;
    height: auto;
    font-size: 2em;
    background: #fff;
    padding: 0 0.5em;
  }
  .item-list h1 span {
    position: relative;
    bottom: 0;
    top: 0.125em;
  }
  .item-list h1 span::after {
    margin: 0.45rem auto;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    border: solid 0.75rem currentColor;
    border-bottom-width: 0;
    border-left-color: transparent;
    border-right-color: transparent;
  }
  .item-list h1 span::before {
    display: none;
  }
  li.unfolded .item-list h1 span {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column-reverse;
  }
  li.unfolded .item-list h1 span::after {
    border-top-width: 0;
    border-bottom-width: 0.75rem;
    border-left-color: transparent;
    border-right-color: transparent;
  }
  [class*="e20"], .eall {
    box-shadow: unset;
  }
}

/* 各周年カラー border定義 */

.e2014 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #cf113f;
}
.e2014 h1, .e2014 h1 a {
  color: #cf113f;
}
.e2015 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #5e768e;
}
.e2015 h1, .e2015 h1 a {
  color: #5e768e;
}
.e2016 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #cf4416;
}
.e2016 h1, .e2016 h1 a {
  color: #cf4416;
}
.e2017 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #cb9b0e;
}
.e2017 h1, .e2017 h1 a {
  color: #cb9b0e;
}
.e2018 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #1e201e;
}
.e2018 h1, .e2018 h1 a {
  color: #1e201e;
}
.e2019 {
  box-shadow: inset -20px 0px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 12px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -12.5px #fff, inset 0px 10px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 0 10px 0 #000;
}
.e2019 h1, .e2019 h1 a {
  color: #fff;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px black;
}
.e2020 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #00b050;
}
.e2020 h1, .e2020 h1 a {
  color: #00b050;
}
.e2021 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #cb872f;
}
.e2021 h1, .e2021 h1 a {
  color: #cb872f;
}
.e2022 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -8px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #895b8a;
}
.e2022 h1, .e2022 h1 a {
  color: #895b8a;
}
.e2023 {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to top, #ef3340, #ef3340 40px, transparent 40px, transparent 8px),linear-gradient(90deg,#000 0px, #000 41px, #fff 41px, #fff 47px, #000 47px, #000 48px);
  background-size: 48px 80px;
  background-position: left bottom;
  background-repeat: repeat-y;
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 8px) 0px #fff;
}
.e2023 h1, .e2023 h1 a {
  color: #ef3340;
}
.e2024 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -8px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #001e43;
}
.e2024 h1, .e2024 h1 a {
  color: #001e43;
}
.e2025 {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -8px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #3d7cce;
}
.e2025 h1, .e2025 h1 a {
  color: #3d7cce;
}
.eall {
  box-shadow: inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) 7.5px #fff, inset calc(3rem - 7.5px) -10px #fff, inset 3rem 0px #653c3c;
}
.eall h1, .eall h1 a {
  color: #653c3c;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 660px) {
  .e2014 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #cf113f;
  }
  .e2015 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #5e768e;
  }
  .e2016 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #cf4416;
  }
  .e2017 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #cb9b0e;
  }
  .e2018 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #1e201e;
  }
  .e2019 {
    box-shadow: inset -10px 0px #fff,inset 10px 0px #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) 3.5px 0 #000;
  }
  .e2019 h1, .e2019 h1 a {
    padding: 1px 0.5em;
  }
  .e2020 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #00b050;
  }
  .e2021 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #cb872f;
  }
  .e2022 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #895b8a;
  }
  .e2023 {
    background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #ef3340, #ef3340 24px, transparent 24px, transparent 8px),linear-gradient(to bottom,#000 0px, #000 17px,#fff 17px, #fff 21px,#000 16px, #000 22px);
    background-size: 48px 22px;
    background-position: top left;
    background-repeat: repeat-x;
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 3px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2px) #0ff1;
  }
  .e2024 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #001e43;
  }
  .e2025 {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #00a5bf;
  }
  .eall {
    box-shadow: inset 0 calc(1.5em - 2.5px) #fff, inset 0 calc(1.5em + 2.5px) #653c3c;
  }
}
[[/module]]
author: Nanigashi Sato
